programme.title: Darts Gold
programme.desc: Archive programme featuring Phil Taylor as he previews the 2011 PDC World Championship. Taylor, known as `The Power', is widely regarded as the greatest darts player in history having picked up the PDC version of the world title 14 times, along with two BDO world crowns and 15 World Matchplay victories. Plus, a look back at his illustrious career, and contributions by darts fan Stephen Fry.(n)

programme.desc: Phil Taylor v Raymond van Barneveld. Action from the semi-final in the 2013 World Championship at Alexandra Palace.
